data: SUS Pharmaceutical Alternatives - HYDROmorphone (DILAUDID BRAND) Tablet Patient Self Adminiistration

Restricted to Addiction Medicine Service for prescribing pharmaceutical alternative HYDROmorphone tablets for patient self-administration. Pharmaceutical alternative orders will be rejected unless ordered by an approved prescriber
Provide harm reduction supplies for safer injecting, including Sterifilt filters
Obtain patient consent and ensure the patient understands the treatment agreement regarding what they are giving consent to and has the opportunity to ask questions prior to signing the consent form
Alert patient's community pharmacy of hospitalization and consider discontinuation of community pharmaceutical alternative(s)
Review active HYDROmorphone orders and discontinue if appropriate
Provider to indicate "dispense quantity" and "first dose start" in order comment
Maximum 112 mg / day (8 mg x 14 tablets)
